QuestData.Title: An Ally in Lower City
QuestData.Description: There is an arakkoa in Lower City by the name of Rilak... He can be trusted. Take the book... to him.$B$B<Adaris drifts into unconsciousness as he returns the book to you.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Ishaal's Almanac to Rilak the Redeemed in the Lower City section of Shattrath City.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have the smell of Skettis on you! Explain yourself!
QuestData.RewardText: This cannot be... this belonged to a talonpriest once. How did you ever come across it?
